name: Sutte Hakkun: BS Version 2
overview: Sutte Hakkun BS Version 2 is a platform/puzzle game that was released in 1998 in Japan. As the game's title implies, it is a sequel of sorts to the earlier Sutte Hakkun (Nov. 1997) and Sutte Hakkun Event Version (Oct. 1997). A later titles in the same series, Sutte Hakkun '98 (Dec. 1998) followed a month after the broadcast of Sutte Hakkun Version 2
